message: Let's be fair and split the money. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Consider accepting, as the value decreases over time.
Your split was a little too greedy for round one, Alice. I'm offering a more reasonable 55/45 split in my favor. Let's close this out before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Bob, it's clear we both want to maximize our gains. Let's stop wasting time with negotiations and split the money 50/50 before inflation eats away any more of our potential profit.
